transcription: This is the second generation of Aria shoes of Dolomite, Aria Surround GDX. The product designed for Nordic walking, active walking and outdoor activities for those people that like to go in a dynamic and sportive way outdoor. The shoe is built on a EVA midsole to give a  light cushioning, but also a good rolling on the walking face, round shape on the back, round shape on the front, protection on the back part, protection on the front. The shoe features an elastic tongue and collar to increase the comfort and a lacing system which was present also on the first generation of Aria shoes. Having a hook like this,  fixing the laces through the hook and then using this as a memory for the next time. To have a good rolling we have designed this flex cut to give the good rolling and cushioning during the walk. The Aria Surround GDX features this year the Surround system from Gore-Tex. That means that the shoe is good in warm and hot conditions  in summertime as well as in wet condition your feet and the socks will always be dry and fresh. So, Arias Round GTX from Dolomite.
